= Introduction =

This page lists the policy that must be granted to jSCEP by the application [http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/lang/SecurityManager.html SecurityManager].

= Details =

The only required permissions are for creating a socket connection to your SCEP server, e.g.

{{{
grant codeBase "file:/path/to/jscep.jar" {
    permission java.net.SocketPermission "${HOST}:${PORT}" "connect";
}
}}}
